scripts.test:local: npm run build && cd dist && python -m http.server 8000
scripts.test:mobile: npm run build && cd dist && python -m http.server 8000 --bind 0.0.0.0
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:force: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting --force
scripts.verify:build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const files=fs.readdirSync('dist'); console.log('Files in dist:', files.length); console.log('Has index.html:', files.includes('index.html'));"
